index.firstVisit: Hey {{- player}}, it's your first time seeing you here! Welcome! Check out what's been happening below!
index.subsequentVisit: Hey {{- player}}! Your last visit was {param1} ago. Check what happened since your last visit...
index.unknownPlayer: Hey it looks like the we don't know your name! we can of course call you {{ device }}, but maybe a name or something would be nice. Let's fix it!
index.subtitle: Home of the true math magicians

error.panic: Oh no!! You totally broke Math Thingy's official home page!
error.hometext: Click here to get a fresh start!

cookies.title: Yay! Cookies!
cookies.text: Life is better with cookies. Most people would agree cookies make life better. For us, they help us improve your browse experience on this site. But if you don't like cookies, that's cool - you can opt out if you wish.

about.checkout: Hey, check out the cool tech stuff that was used to create "the official homepage" of Math Thingy!!
about.contactTitle: Need to get something off your chest?
about.contactText:
If you've seen a mistake (impossible), have suggestions for improvements (highly unlikely), just want to pass along that the site and app are great (always do) or if you have a question (doesn't matter about what)...why not pass it along to one of the devs who built this site? 

 You may even get an answer!

contact.title: Feel free to spam us!
contact.namePlaceholder: So we know what to call you...
contact.emailPlaceholder: So we can send you a reply...
contact.messagePlaceholder: Write your thoughts, questions, remarks or whatever here...
contact.nameValidation: Surely a name would be nice we think... üòâ
contact.emailValidation: A valid email address is handy if you ever want a reply
contact.messageValidation: A message with no text...is that helpful?
